## ListDisplayProps type

Props forwarded to [ListDisplay](./list-display.listdisplay.md)<!-- -->. They mirror [ListConfig](./list-display.listconfig.md) and therefore describe the full data, schema, and action configuration for the list.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ListDisplayProps = ListConfig<any, any>;
```
**References:** [ListConfig](./list-display.listconfig.md)
